title: Flu Season Alert
message: High demand during flu season. Monitor stock levels closely. Expected shortage until March 2025.

title: COVID-19 Interaction Warning
message: May cause harmful side effects in COVID-19 patients. Dispense only to patients with negative COVID test or documented recovery.
restrictions: Require COVID test results or recovery documentation

title: COVID-19 Caution
message: Increased risk of cardiac complications when combined with COVID-19. Monitor patient closely.

title: Supply Chain Disruption
message: Manufacturing delays affecting 500mg tablets. Consider alternative formulations.

title: Batch Recall Notice
message: Recall of batches LOT2024A-LOT2024F due to contamination. Do not dispense affected batches.
